allSaves.value: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

source.value: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City

description.value:
Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 1. Its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

Heightened The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and reach increases by 10 feet (or by 15 feet if it started out Tiny), The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Heightened Choose either the 2nd-level or 4th-level version of this spell and apply its effects to 10 willing creatures.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
description.label: Description

description.value: When first exposed to bright light, the monster is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until the end of its next turn. After this exposure, light doesn’t blind the monster again until after it spends 1 hour in darkness. However, as long as the monster is in an area of bright light, it’s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}.

Kralgurn’s Attacks of Opportunity not only wound creatures, but also shatter their confidence. If Kralgurn hits and deals damage with an Attack of Opportunity, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 4 on a critical hit.

When Kralgurn attacks a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creature, he gains a circumstance bonus to damage equal to three times the target’s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} value.
